channel.title: Dt on widgetframe + blogdown
channel.description: Recent content in Dt on widgetframe + blogdown

item.title: DT + widgeframe
item.description: The two examples below show how to properly embed a DT widget inside a blog post using the widgetframe package. DT library(DT) library(widgetframe) ## Loading required package: htmlwidgets dt <- datatable( head(iris, 20), options = list( columnDefs = list(list(className = 'dt-center', targets = 5)), pageLength = 5, lengthMenu = c(5, 10, 15, 20)), fillContainer = T) frameWidget(dt, height = 350, width = '95%') {"x":{"url":"/post/dt_files/figure-html//widgets/widget_dt-01.html","options":{"xdomain":"*","allowfullscreen":false}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}
